languages.text: "Надеюсь, побыв их наглядным пособием. Я почти уверена, что за выходкой с кровью стоишь ты, извращенная мразь!"
"With you as the study material, I hope? I am almost certain you're the one behind this blood spectacle, you depraved scum!"
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, побыв их наглядным пособием. Я почти уверена, что за выходкой с кровью стоишь ты, извращенная мразь!"

languages.text: "Mit Euch als Forschungsgegenstand, hoffe ich? Ich bin mir nahezu sicher, dass Ihr hinter diesem blutigen Spektakel steckt, Ihr verkommener Abschaum!"
languages.original_text: "With you as the study material, I hope? I am almost certain you're the one behind this blood spectacle, you depraved scum!"

traits.locale_text: "Mit Euch als Forschungsgegenstand, hoffe ich? Ich bin mir nahezu sicher, dass Ihr hinter diesem blutigen Spektakel steckt, Ihr verkommener Abschaum!"

languages.text: « Et c'est vous qui serviriez de support didactique, j'espère ? Je parierais que c'est vous qui avez orchestré ce spectacle sanglant, sale monstre dépravé ! »
languages.original_text: "With you as the study material, I hope? I am almost certain you're the one behind this blood spectacle, you depraved scum!"

traits.locale_text: « Et c'est vous qui serviriez de support didactique, j'espère ? Je parierais que c'est vous qui avez orchestré ce spectacle sanglant, sale monstre dépravé ! »

languages.text: «¿Contigo como sujeto de pruebas? ¡Estoy casi segura de que eres el responsable de este sanguinario espectáculo, depravado!».
languages.original_text: "With you as the study material, I hope? I am almost certain you're the one behind this blood spectacle, you depraved scum!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Contigo como sujeto de pruebas? ¡Estoy casi segura de que eres el responsable de este sanguinario espectáculo, depravado!».

languages.text: 「お前を勉強材料として、でしょう？この血生臭い見世物の黒幕は、ほぼ間違いなくあなたよ。この堕落したクズめ！」
languages.original_text: "With you as the study material, I hope? I am almost certain you're the one behind this blood spectacle, you depraved scum!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前を勉強材料として、でしょう？この血生臭い見世物の黒幕は、ほぼ間違いなくあなたよ。この堕落したクズめ！」

languages.text: “那是不是应该由你来当实习材料？我差不多可以肯定，你就是这场血腥事件的幕后黑手，你这该死的渣滓！”
languages.original_text: "With you as the study material, I hope? I am almost certain you're the one behind this blood spectacle, you depraved scum!"

traits.locale_text: “那是不是应该由你来当实习材料？我差不多可以肯定，你就是这场血腥事件的幕后黑手，你这该死的渣滓！”

languages.original_text: "With you as the study material, I hope? I am almost certain you're the one behind this blood spectacle, you depraved scum!"

languages.text: "Senin üzerinde çalışacağımı umuyorum. Tüm bu kanlı gösterinin ardında senin olduğuna emin sayılırım ahlaksız pislik!"
languages.original_text: "With you as the study material, I hope? I am almost certain you're the one behind this blood spectacle, you depraved scum!"
